original_title: 大嫌いな担任教師に卒業までの一年間、変態セックスを仕込まれたセーラー少女 吉岡ひより
overview: Hiyori is a pretty 18 years old student, who became the obsession of one of her male teachers. A disgusting and perverted guy who is pretty unpleasant to look at. He knows he has zero actual chances with Hiyori so he assembles a plan to trick her. He summons her to a task at the library and then feeds her water with roofies.
title: Teen Girl In School Uniform Having Perverted Sex With The Teacher She Disliked – Hiyori Yoshioka
